Are you sure you want to archive these pages?

Admin.BATCH_DELETE_PROMPT:
You have {num} page(s) selected.

Are you sure you want to delete these pages?

These pages and all of their children pages will be deleted and sent to the archive.

Admin.BATCH_RESTORE_PROMPT:
You have {num} page(s) selected.

Do you really want to restore to stage?

Children of archived pages will be restored to the root level, unless those pages are also being restored.
